Show All Hide All Step 1 Link to heading bash bandit0@bandit:~$ ls Show Once login, we need to first find out what files is in the directory.

item.title: Glossary
item.description: Feeling lost with the jargons? Glossary is here to help!

item.title: Natas 27 - 28 Walkthrough
item.description: Note: You can view / hide lengthy explanation with buttons like “Show/Hide All”, or “Show/Hide” button at each step. Show All Hide All Before you start Link to heading URL: natas27.natas.labs.overthewire.org Login password for Natas Level 27: u3RRffXjysjgwFU6b9xa23i6prmUsYne Source Codes Link to heading Raw Codes Link to heading Click to show the given source codes for us to refer: Show php <?php // morla / 10111 // database gets cleared every 5 min /* CREATE TABLE `users` ( `username` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `password` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL ); */ function checkCredentials($link,$usr,$pass){ $user=mysqli_real_escape_string($link, $usr); $password=mysqli_real_escape_string($link, $pass); $query = "SELECT username from users where username='$user' and password='$password' "; $res = mysqli_query($link, $query); if(mysqli_num_rows($res) > 0){ return True; } return False; } function validUser($link,$usr){ $user=mysqli_real_escape_string($link, $usr); $query = "SELECT * from users where username='$user'"; $res = mysqli_query($link, $query); if($res) { if(mysqli_num_rows($res) > 0) { return True; } } return False; } function dumpData($link,$usr){ $user=mysqli_real_escape_string($link, trim($usr)); $query = "SELECT * from users where username='$user'"; $res = mysqli_query($link, $query); if($res) { if(mysqli_num_rows($res) > 0) { while ($row = mysqli_fetch_assoc($res)) { // thanks to Gobo for reporting this bug!

item.title: About
item.description: ABOUT CYS3CGUY Link to heading CyS3cGuy is a blogging site created by Naidamair to share articles, opinions, and walkthroughs. The site’s name is derived from “Cyber Security Guy” and it was founded in 2024. Its primary focus is on IT and Cyber Security topics. You can find walkthroughs at this site. The main differentiator between the walkthroughs in this site and the other sites is that this site tends to be more verbose than others as the author strives to provide in-depth analysis and thought process that gradually unravel the solution, rather than providing the solution directly.
